name: Shadow Of Deception
description:
Shadow Of Deception

My first attempt at creating a game. This was a big learning opportunity and learned a lot about programming and the Godot engine!

Use the fireballs, mirrors and springs to solve the problems given to unlock the next level

I would appreciate any feed back whatsoever bad or good!

Player Controls:

Arrow keys - Movement

Z - Reset Level

X - Attack 

C - Jump

Assets Used:

Tileset created by 0x72 (https://0x72.itch.io)
